caption.body: NOW PLAYING: In a nod to animation’s origins as shadow play, London-based filmmaker Ben Steer presents the story of a woman and her son fleeing through a dizzying landscape of towers and tiers in “Mamoon”, which was inspired by reports of the Syrian refugee crisis.  See “Mamoon" by Ben Steer, now playing in the Video Arts Room located pre-security in the International Terminal.
